title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js and more in this comprehensive course.

content.title: Chapter 1: HTML Fundamentals
content.description: Learn the basics of HTML structure, tags, and semantic elements.

content.title: Chapter 2: CSS Styling
content.description: Dive into CSS selectors, layouts, and responsive design principles.

content.title: Chapter 3: JavaScript Basics
content.description: Understand variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and event handling.

title: Advanced Python Programming
description: Take your Python skills to the next level with advanced concepts and real-world projects.

content.title: Chapter 1: Object-Oriented Programming
content.description: Explore classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation in Python.

content.title: Chapter 2: Data Structures and Algorithms
content.description: Implement lists, dictionaries, sorting, searching, and graph algorithms.

content.title: Chapter 3: File I/O and Libraries
content.description: Work with files, exceptions, and popular libraries like NumPy and Pandas.

title: UI/UX Design Masterclass
description: Learn to create beautiful, user-friendly interfaces with modern design principles.

content.title: Chapter 1: Design Principles
content.description: Understand color theory, typography, and layout fundamentals.

content.title: Chapter 2: User Research
content.description: Conduct user interviews, surveys, and create personas and journey maps.

content.title: Chapter 3: Prototyping Tools
content.description: Use Figma, Adobe XD, and Sketch to build interactive prototypes.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Master SEO, social media, content marketing and analytics to grow your business.

content.title: Chapter 1: SEO Basics
content.description: Learn keyword research, on-page optimization, and technical SEO.

content.title: Chapter 2: Social Media Marketing
content.description: Strategies for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

content.title: Chapter 3: Content and Email Marketing
content.description: Create compelling content and build email campaigns for lead generation.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Understand the core concepts of AI and machine learning with hands-on projects.

content.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to ML
content.description: Overview of supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

content.title: Chapter 2: Data Preprocessing
content.description: Handle missing data, feature scaling, and encoding categorical variables.

content.title: Chapter 3: Algorithms
content.description: Implement linear regression, decision trees, and neural networks.

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native.

content.title: Chapter 1: React Native Setup
content.description: Install tools, create projects, and understand the architecture.

content.title: Chapter 2: Core Components
content.description: Build UI with View, Text, Image, and navigation using React Navigation.

content.title: Chapter 3: State Management and APIs
content.description: Use Redux or Context API and integrate with REST APIs.
